text: phir jab moosa ne avadhi pooree kar dee aur apane gharavaalon ko lekar chala to toor kee or usane ek aag-see dekhee. usane apane gharavaalon se kaha, "thaharo, mainne ek aag ka avalokan kiya hai. kadaachit main vahaan se tumhaare paas koee khabar le aaoon ya us aag se koee angaara hee, taaki tum taap sako.
